com.hutchgrant.networks.gplus

Class HttpUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hutchgrant.networks.gplus.HttpUtils

  • public class HttpUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Static utilities for handling HTTP responses.

      Buffer size used to read HTTP responses.

    • Field Detail

      • IO_BUFFER_SIZE

        public static final int IO_BUFFER_SIZE
        Buffer size used to read HTTP responses.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MAX_READ_SIZE

        public static final int MAX_READ_SIZE
        Maximum total size of HTTP response that will be read. Larger responses will be considered an error.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getContent

        public static java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream getContent(HttpResponse response)
                                                throws java.io.IOException
        Read the content of an HttpResponse.
        Parameters:
        response - the HttpResponse to be read.
        Returns:
        the content of the HttpResponse as a ByteArrayOutputStream.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the content size exceeds MAX_READ_SIZE bytes.

        public static java.lang.String getErrorResponse(java.net.HttpURLConnection urlConnection)
